General.Name: Douglas Elliman Inc
General.Description: Douglas Elliman Inc. engages in the real estate services and property technology investment business in the United States. It operates in two segments, Real Estate Brokerage, and Corporate Activities and Other. The company also provides residential real estate brokerage services; and ancillary services, such as property management, title, and escrow services. Douglas Elliman Inc. was founded in 1911 and is headquartered in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 4400 Biscayne Boulevard, Miami, FL, United States, 33137
